description.en:
These are stories that deal with being an underage mother and how the characters dealt with the situation.

a series of oneshots:

We are merely 17 years old and in love. And then I suddenly got pregnant, although he proposed to me straight away, my parents were against this, but I don't want to get an abortion, I want to be a mommy. No one can help us... which path is there for us to take?

[b]Little Life Growing Inside[/b] - Falling in love, and then getting pregnant, is that a sin? Just because we're still in high school?

[b]Spanning the Lost Life[/b] -  Getting an abortion during the age of 15, and then being betrayed by the lover. I won't love anyone ever again, definitely...

[b]I Will Become a Strong Mother[/b] - I'm a single mother, I have a crush on someone, is having this type of feeling a burden?

[b]Believing the Feelings of Love[/b]
